org.ssa4j
Class ScrapeSessionManager

java.lang.Object
  org.ssa4j.ScrapeSessionManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnterpriseScrapeSessionManager, MockScrapeSessionManager, ProfessionalScrapeSessionManager
public abstract class ScrapeSessionManager
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for ScrapeSessionManagers does all the Scraper annotation binding and processing. Subclass this class to create specialized ScrapeSessionManagers.

Author:
Rodney Aiglstorfer
See Also:
ProfessionalScrapeSessionManager, EnterpriseScrapeSessionManager, MockScrapeSessionManager

public void scrape(java.lang.Object session)
            throws ScrapeException
Kicks off the scrape using the given annotated session object.

Parameters:
session - A class annotated with ScrapeSession
Throws:
ScrapeException - thrown if there are any problems with the scrape

scrape

public void scrape(java.lang.Object session,
                   ScrapeSessionListener listener,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> cookiejar)
            throws ScrapeException
Kicks off the scrape using the given annotated session object with optional support for a listener and cookieJar

Parameters:
session - A class annotated with ScrapeSession
listener - A class that implements ScrapeSessionListener (can be null)
cookiejar - A cookieJar within which to read/write ScrapeSessionCookies
Throws:
ScrapeException
